dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3895844O] Republishing Engadget content
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 28, 2007 9:37 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3895844O] Republishing Engadget content

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Republishing Engadget content
Added by system at Saturday, Apr 28 2007 01:14 pm 
X-MailFrom: ryan@engadget.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Sat Apr 28 13:14:30 2007 
Received: (qmail 20393 invoked by alias); 28 Apr 2007 18:14:30 -0000 
Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net 
Received: (qmail 20390 invoked from network); 28 Apr 2007 18:14:30 -0000

Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) 
  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 28 Apr 2007 18:14:30 -0000

Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); 
  Sat, 28 Apr 2007 13:14:30 -0500 
Return-path: <ryan@engadget.com> 
Delivery-date: Sat, 28 Apr 2007 13:14:30 -0500 
Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) 
 by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from ryan@engadget.com) 
 with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
 (Exim) 
        id 1HhrRF-0001vV-Th; Sat, 28 Apr 2007 13:14:29 -0500 
Received: from mail.frankensite.com ([206.252.131.157]) 
        by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from ryan@engadget.com) 
        with esmtps (SSLv3:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
        (Exim) 
        id 1HhrR3-000L90-70; Sat, 28 Apr 2007 13:14:17 -0500 
Received: from [10.0.0.109] ([67.188.33.207]) 
        by mail.frankensite.com (Merak 8.3.1) with ASMTP id HWP15242; 
        Sat, 28 Apr 2007 14:13:42 -0400 
Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.3) 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=US-ASCII; delsp=yes; format=flowed 
Message-Id: <7A9FFC18-E506-491F-8616-F95FF3A3FC5D@engadget.com> 
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com, 
 admins@theplanet.com 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit 
From: Ryan Block <ryan@engadget.com> 
Subject: Republishing Engadget content 
Date: Sat, 28 Apr 2007 11:13:38 -0700 
To: rich@mcmanners.co.uk 
X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.752.3) 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 28 Apr 2007 18:14:30.0513 (UTC)
FILETIME=[10B1CE10:01C789C1] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Hi there, 
 
It appears that you're republishing Engadget content on your site   
(http://www.paniczoom.eu/story-193-xbox-360-elite-vs-classic-the-  
test.html). Please note that republishing our content in whole is in   
violation of Weblogs, Inc. and AOL copyright and terms of service.   
Feel free to use 50 word excepts (with proper linkback), but   
otherwise we have to ask you take down our content. You may contact   
me with any further questions regarding this matter. Thank you for   
your understanding and cooperation! 
 
-- 
Best, 
Ryan Block 
Managing Editor, Engadget
